TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IndexedGlyphRun extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Allows text engine clients to map a text source character index to the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IndexedGlyphRun object allows a text engine client to obtain glyph information for a text source character such as the glyph's cluster map, glyph indices, and glyph typeface.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> that corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> object.
Gets the text source character index that corresponds to the beginning of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun">.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that represents the text source character index.

Docs.summary: Gets the text source character length that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> object.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> value that represents the length of the text source character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of the TextSourceLength property is not necessarily equal to the character count of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
